metadata.description: Canonical JSON format for survey question analysis

question_example.question_text: What was the total income of all family members from all sources before taxes in [reference month]?

categories.reasoning: Direct question about total family income from all sources
Income is primary indicator of socioeconomic status
Implies understanding of family unit definition

question_example.notes: Standard income question format used across multiple surveys

survey_metadata_example.full_name: Survey of Income and Program Participation

cluster_example.canonical_question_text: What was your total household income last year?

notes.scoring: Multi-dimensional scores across Census taxonomy dimensions. No threshold applied - raw scores preserved for analysis.
notes.survey_context: Same question text may have different categorizations based on survey context
notes.offline_processing: All embeddings generated with locally cached RoBERTa-large model
